resources.string: Here will be shown the joke
Why is the spider the neediest animal in the world?\nBecause it is an arachneedyou.
Why doesnt the pine tree get lost in the forest?\nBecause it has a pine cone.
What was a pagodeiro doing in church?\nIt was singing PÁ GOD.
Why was Napoleon always called to parties?\nBecause he was GOOD AT PARTY.
What is the king of cheeses?\nIts cottage cheese.
Why doesnt the old lady wear a watch?\nBecause shes a lady.
When did Americans first eat meat?\nWhen Cristovão Com Lombo arrived.
